_header: I deal his bin[?] tache [Ic del his bin teche]
_description: An English couplet in a Latin story about a boy with an ulcerated hand

CamGon414.Transcription:
Ic del ish his bin techeIaht me hauith made
                    itsche
CamGon414.Editions:
James,  Montague Rhodes. 
             A Descriptive Catalogue of the Manuscripts in the Library of Gonville
                and Caius College, Cambridge.
         2 vols. Cambridge: at the UP, 1907: 1.487.
